outline.title: SintraPrime Supermemory: High-ROI Upgrade Roadmap
outline.summary: Title slide introducing the High-ROI Upgrade Roadmap for SintraPrime Supermemory.

outline.title: The Discipline That Prevents System Failure
outline.summary: Outlines the core philosophy of Capability → Proof → Rollback → Repeat to prevent system failure.

outline.title: Current State - v2 Foundation is Production-Ready
outline.summary: Details the six core capabilities of the v2 Supermemory scripts that make them production-ready.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/pasted_file_40cdnq_image.png - The image shows a GitHub repository related to 'supermemoryai/claude-supermemory', which aligns with the slide's topic of 'SintraPrime Supermemory' and its operational capabilities.

outline.title: 12 High-ROI Upgrades Across 5 Strategic Categories
outline.summary: Overview of the 12 upgrades categorized into Better Proofs, Observability, Operational Hardening, Governance, and Make.com Routing.

outline.title: Category A - Better Proofs Prevent Silent Breakage
outline.summary: Details the three upgrades in Category A: Strict Schema Version Pinning, Golden Fixture Tests, and Receipt Integrity Check.

outline.title: Category B - Observability Enables Proactive Detection
outline.summary: Details the two upgrades in Category B: Health Snapshot JSON and Health Diff Script.

outline.title: Category C - Operational Hardening Prevents Chaos
outline.summary: Details the three upgrades in Category C: Lock File / Mutex, Receipt Rotation + Retention, and Timeout Discipline.

outline.title: Category D - Governance Upgrades Enable Enterprise Control
outline.summary: Details the two upgrades in Category D: Policy Pack Hash and Two-Person Rule Proof.

outline.title: Category E - Make.com Routing Ensures No Silent Failures
outline.summary: Details the two upgrades in Category E: Enhanced Router Enforcement and Receipt File Existence Guard.

outline.title: Phase 1 - Quick Wins Deliver Immediate Impact
outline.summary: Outlines the plan for Phase 1 (Weeks 1-2) focusing on high-ROI, low-effort upgrades.

outline.title: Phase 2 - Observability & Hardening Build Resilience
outline.summary: Outlines the plan for Phase 2 (Weeks 3-4) focusing on proactive detection and reliability.

outline.title: Phase 3 - Governance & Proofs Enable Court-Safe Audits
outline.summary: Outlines the plan for Phase 3 (Weeks 5-8) focusing on strengthening audit trails and controls.

outline.title: Phase 4 - Advanced Governance Achieves Enterprise Grade
outline.summary: Outlines the plan for Phase 4 (Weeks 9-12) focusing on high-risk operation controls.

outline.title: Success Metrics Define Progress and Prevent Drift
outline.summary: Defines the operational, observability, and governance metrics to measure success.

outline.title: Four Anti-Patterns That Kill Autonomous Systems
outline.summary: Identifies four common failure modes to avoid: Scope Creep, Vibes-Based Decisions, No Rollback Plan, and Silent Failures.

outline.title: Implementation Roadmap - 12 Weeks to Excellence
outline.summary: Summarizes the 12-week implementation roadmap with clear milestones for each phase.

outline.title: Next Steps - Start With Phase 1 This Week
outline.summary: Lists concrete actions to begin implementation immediately.

outline.title: Summary - Discipline Enables Operational Excellence
outline.summary: Summarizes the key takeaways and reinforces the core philosophy of discipline over vibes.
